skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in crafting engaging user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Proficient in React.js, I create responsive and visually appealing web applications. With a keen eye for design and a focus on user experience, I bring simplicity and elegance to front-end development. Let's build user-friendly and visually striking websites together!

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I'm a back-end developer skilled in building robust server-side applications. Proficient in Node.js and Express.js, I bring data to life and ensure smooth functionality behind the scenes. My expertise includes working with databases like MongoDB, creating RESTful APIs, and optimizing server performance.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I'm passionate about creating seamless and delightful user experiences. Proficient in UI/UX design principles, I specialize in turning concepts into visually appealing and intuitive interfaces. From wireframes to polished designs, I bring a user-centric approach to every project.

portfolio.title: Car Mart Mock Used Car Database
portfolio.description: Built with Express, Node.js, and MongoDB using Mongoose, this app showcases a powerful backend for a seamless Mock Used Car Database experience.

portfolio.title: News Hub
portfolio.description: Discover the latest top stories effortlessly or tailor your news experience with a custom search on News Hub. This React-powered app brings the world's news to your fingertips, offering a seamless and personalized way to stay informed.
